nodes.text: This blue-leaved plant was used by Nuvo Vindi in the resurrection of the Blue Shadow Virus. A number of them were kept potted in soil in a lab on Naboo.

In the original script, this plant was supposed to be a "tea leaf plant", but a decision was made to have the plants be blue to indicate their role in the manufacturing of the virus. It is unclear if the plants are native to Naboo.
